celica7.name: Celica
celica7.title: Sunlit Priestesses
celica7.description: Celica, a priestess and follower of Mila, and Serra, a cleric and follower of Elimine, bring their protection to the beach this summer. They appear in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia / Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.
celica7.harmonized:
Neutralizes any【Penalty】, restores 40 HP, and grants【Resonance: Blades】to unit and allies from the same titles as unit for 1 turn.
Once used, Harmonized Skill cannot be activated again right away. At start of every third turn, if Harmonized Skill has already been used, unit can use Harmonized Skill again.
(Harmonized Skills can be used by tapping the Harmonized button. Harmonized Skills cannot be used by units deployed using
Pair Up
.)
【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).
【Resonance: Blades】
Grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat for 1 turn.

Castle Hall: **Serra:** An adorable, helpless person like me is better suited to a summer beach than a rugged battlefield!
**Celica:** I am used to playing at the beach on Novis Island, where I once lived. It, too, was surrounded by the sea.
**Serra:** Saint Elimine, I pray that all will enjoy this wonderful summer, and may they fawn over me in my swimsuit.
**Celica:** Does this swimsuit look all right on me, Serra? I want to be sure before Alm sees it.
**Serra:** You don't look half bad in a swimsuit yourself, Celica! There is simply no way to conceal our nobility, is there?
Visit: **Serra:** I am Serra, a cleric in service to Saint Elimine. I, with Celica, am delivering a letter from [F].
Level: **Serra:** Hehe! We will play the leading roles this summer!
**Celica:** It seems to be working out all right. We won't be beaten by this summer heat!
**Celica:** Are you all right, Serra? You shouldn't push yourself too hard. Let's rest awhile in the shade.
Summon: I am Celica, from Zofia. Together, Serra, let us pray for everyone's lasting happiness!
Learn Skill: **Serra:** Look at this Celica! Now, no eye on the beach will be able to look away from us!
Confession:
**Celica:** Serra... You said you were born of a noble family with a long, distinguished history in Etruria, right?
**Serra:** Y-yes, that's right! Since I was born an aristocrat, no matter what I do, my body overflows with a noble light!
**Celica:** I can feel that light shining from your soul. Your cheerfulness brings a smile to everyone's faces.
No matter if you were born a noble or not, I'm sure your light would still shine on any who beheld it.
**Serra:** Y-you're right. My family's status may be an insignificant detail...
**Celica:** Haha... We may follow different gods, but I think we can do our best to bring light to the future together!
Status: *sigh*
"What do you think of my bathing suit?" "Looks good! Now we're an even match!"
Conversation: **Celica:** The sea is beautiful... Come, Serra. Let's go for a swim!
**Serra:** Ugh! How careless can you be? You've got so much beauty hiding in there somewhere, yet no sensibility.
You shouldn't just run off to the beach. You need to apply this oil to protect your skin first.
**Celica:** Thank you, Serra. You know so much about these types of things.
**Serra:** Of course I do. As the daughter of a count, I must protect my beauty at all costs so as not to shame the family.
Getting a sunburn is out of the question! But, I still want to play on the beach, of course...
And everyone might be terribly disappointed if they didn't get to see me in my swimsuit.
Saint Elimine herself has guided me on a path of servitude... It's the least I can do for them!
*sigh* OK! Come on. Hurry up, Celica! Let's go!
**Celica:** But I thought— I'm not quite ready...
**Serra:** I must show off how I look in my swimsuit to as many people as possible, as quickly as possible!
First, we'll walk to the end of this sandy beach, and then we'll swim all the way back.
**Celica:** Oh? Isn't that rather far? And are you sure about swimming all the way back? It sounds difficult...
**Serra:** And of course I need to show off how I look when I'm relaxing. So I'll carry a fancy drink in hand too.
Woo! I am so busy! I can't believe how hard I work for Elimine. So, so commendable! Ugh, I'm tearing up...
**Celica:** So... Does that mean you will make the most of your time here at the beach?
**Serra:** Yes, of course I will! Let's go, Celica! Everyone is waiting to see me.

nino6.name: Nino
nino6.title: Burst of Summer
nino6.description: A young girl and member of the Black Fang, a league of assassins. She brings smiles to the people of Askr, in the midst of the glittering sea. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

Castle Hall: Running from the ocean surf makes for great training! If I keep this up, I'll be as fast as Jaffar soon.
The ocean is beautiful, isn't it? I want the others to see it too.
Look! Look! That stall made a frozen treat just for me! It's covered in this sweet syrup!
The ocean is so big. There could be a continent even larger than Elibe somewhere beyond that horizon.
Uncle Merlinus got this swimsuit for me. What do you think?
Visit: I'm Nino! I was entrusted with this souvenir from the ocean for you by [F]!
Level: Even at the beach, I put up a good fight! Now I have another story to tell Jaffar.
Haha! Once we're done here, I'm going to eat a bunch of cold fruit!
Ugh... The sunlight is so intense. I feel a bit dizzy...
Summon: I'm Nino! Today's important mission is...to enjoy summer at the beach!
Learn Skill: Can I really have this?! This just became the best summer ever!
Confession:
Thanks for inviting me to the sea with you, [S]!
I had no idea beach adventures could be this much fun.
I made a new goal for myself. I want to bring the others to the beach next time so we can all have a good time!
Lloyd will be there. And Linus. And Uncle Jan... And Jaffar.
After we swim in the ocean, we'll sit on the sand eating tasty food and watching the sun set together!
For that to happen, I need to keep working hard to bring peace to Askr. Haha! I'm super motivated now!
Status: O-oh...
The pretty ocean gives me so much energy; I could run forever!
*gasp* That's so cold! Is it a frozen snack?
I'm not so confident in the water, so I'm using a floatie.
Awww, look! A cute crab!
Hmm... What souvenir do you think will make Jaffar happy?
I wish the others could see this ocean...
I'm so glad we can make wonderful summer memories together.

palla5.name: Palla
palla5.title: Soaring Summer
palla5.description: Eldest of the three sisters who are pegasus knights of the Macedonian Whitewings. Enjoys Askr's summer to its fullest. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

Castle Hall: Isn't the ocean fabulous? I wonder... What would it be like to come here with someone special.
Askr's ocean is quite calm compared to the turbulent waters of the ocean between Archanea and Valentia.
You can count on me to patrol the beach. I'll get the best view of these sandy shores from the sky.
Flying above it all with a nice breeze blowing in from the ocean makes me grateful to be a pegasus knight.
I didn't expect to show up in another world wearing a swimsuit... How will I explain this to my little sisters?
Visit: I'm Palla, one of the Macedonian Whitewings, flying in a summery gift from [F].
Level: That was a wonderful experience. I will never forget the memories I made this summer.
Whew... Looks like everything worked out. Let's enjoy some cold drinks to cool ourselves down.
I know now is not the time to feel self-conscious, but...
Summon: I am Palla, of the Whitewings. Isn't Askr's ocean lovely? An ideal spot for me and my pegasus to rest our wings.
Learn Skill: Oh! What a wonderful gift! I promise I'll live up to expectations.
Confession:
Thank you for inviting me to Askr's beach, [S].
From Archanea to Valentia...my days of fighting had no end in sight. This has been a pleasant change of pace.
But, if I could have a wish right now, it would be to show this lovely place to my little sisters too.
That desire has only grown stronger during my time here.
Sharing the little things that bring us joy with each other... That is how we have lived our lives to this point.
I want the three of us to fly to this beach together someday. When that time comes, I truly hope you join us.
Status: Hmm...
I've been looking forward to today. The ocean is so beautiful in summertime...
Oh! Is that drink for me? Thank you. It's even a pretty color too.
I've never worn a swimsuit before... It makes me feel a little self-conscious.
I can tell my sisters are jealous, though Catria would never let that show.
It's really quite enjoyable just walking along the beach with you.
Watching the sunset along the ocean shore with him— Uh, no... That's foolishness.
The sun is beating down hard... We shouldn't forget to wear sunscreen.

lapis3.name: Lapis
lapis3.title: Forager of the Sea
lapis3.description: A warrior of Brodia and retainer to Alcryst, she hunts for food on the beach and in the ocean. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: I'm not just fishing. I'm also gathering colorful shells and beach grass, as one does while enjoying the summer.
I caught the unique fish you see in my creel from a pond on the Somniel. It's an island that floats in the sky.
Is the heat wearing you out? I'll go extract salt from some ocean water and make my salt candies for you.
Leave free diving, distance swimming, and water combat to me! I trained in the raging oceans of Brodia.
When I tried to make myself a classy swimsuit for playing in the ocean, my hands wove a fishing net instead.
Visit: Mind if I fish while I'm here? After I drop off this summer greeting from [F], that is.
Level: Wow! I caught quite the haul today! The ocean really is bountiful.
I want to try using this power for fishing... What?! No, I meant battle!
The ocean certainly is moody today. Should I come back another time?
Summon: Lapis, royal soldier of Brodia, here to report in! Is this where we're fishing today? I will bring in a big haul.
Learn Skill: Fantastic! This is perfect for summer! I'm not sure I deserve it, but it makes me happy.
Confession:
Here's some beach grass, tropical fruits, and freshly grilled fish! All for you, [S]!
Oh, no, you didn't look hungry. But... Well, sharing food with a friend is how I show them I care about them.
Where I'm from, it's a sign of strong friendship when you give someone the most delicious part of something.
Um... Heheh. It's just...after our ocean adventures this summer, I wanted to give you a gift to show you how I feel.
Here, this is for you... It's the head of a huge fish I just caught. That's the most delicious part!
Status: Swimsuit? Oh, no, this outfit is made for battle in the water. I designed it myself.
Hold on! Hands off the fish! I've got plans to mince them all later.
Isn't the ocean amazing? It's beautiful, vast...and full of so many edible things.
Brodia has a robust fishing industry. I'm better suited to using a harpoon than sitting around with a fishing pole.
I caught so many fish today! I got matob octopuses and mir catfish. Oh, and even big-eyed sardines.
I'll give this seashell to Prince Alcryst and this one to Citrinne... When it comes to souvenirs, you can't beat seashells given freely by the sea.
These garments aren't perfectly made, but even if they get damaged, I can reinforce them with seaweed and keep fighting.

fogado2.name: Fogado
fogado2.title: Summer of Bliss
fogado2.description: First prince of Solm. He loves the heat, the ocean, the beach, and everyone. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: Me? I'm good at all kinds of sports— you name it! Except for fishing. I can't get the hang of it. Any tips?
Ta-da! This floatie is made to look like Emblem Ike's ring. Next I need one that looks like Emblem Corrin's!
I hear Askr's summer is over before you know it. But not this time! If you miss the heat, just come and find me.
Let's head to the beach later when things quiet down. Beneath the stars, listening to the waves... So relaxing.
It's summer, so we NEED to throw a party! Let's gather some tasty food and enjoy tonight with our friends.
Visit: Oh, hi there. I'm Fogado and I'm making the most of this summer with [F]!
Level: Wahoo! This is why I love summer!
This is all thanks to you being there for me. Let's make it a summer to remember!
Maybe I was goofing off too much! Focus, Fogado!
Summon: Huh? I was having fun at the beach and now I'm...here? Ah, well. Nice to meet you! I'm Fogado!
Learn Skill: This'll be the best memory from the summer for sure. Thanks!
Confession:
Hot, isn't it? So hot that we should DEFINITELY go jump in the ocean. What do you say to a swim?
Just us, I mean. I love partying with our friends, but I wanted to have a nice, long chat with you.
We can listen to the murmuring of the tide. Picture it. You'll remember today for the rest of your life.
At least, I hope you will! I want to be someone who's special to you. A true friend. I hope you feel the same...
You do? Great! Though I guess I shouldn't be surprised. I knew I could count on you.
OK, let's head to that beach. I know the PERFECT spot. C'mon, hurry it up!
Status: Whoa!
Take a look! Fogado, captain of the Sentinels and prince of Solm, wearing a swimsuit. Haha. You're swooning again, aren't you?
Huh, this? It's a floatie! Uh, maybe it isn't a surprise since I live in the desert, but I don't have a lot of experience being in water.
Solm is a desert queendom, so I love summer! All this bright sunshine is invigorating!
The ocean sure is beautiful. Just appreciating the scenery and the crashing of the waves is nice.
There's a place called the Azure Coast where I was raised. I'd like to show it to you someday.
I bet Pandreo would love to have this seashell as a decoration, and ooh... Bunet is definitely gonna want to taste this fruit.
Summer won't last, so we can't just lie around! Come on! Let's get out in the sunshine and create some memories!
